Description: Google Analytics lets you measure your advertising ROI as well as track your Flash, video, and social networking sites and applications.
Name: Google Analytics

Methods.Name: List User Activity Sessions
Methods.Description: List all activity sessions of a user.

Methods.Name: List Views (Profiles)
Methods.Description: Lists views (profiles) to which the user has access.

Methods.Name: List Properties
Methods.Description: Lists properties to which the user has access.

Methods.Name: List Core Metrics by Source - v3
Methods.Description: Retrieves core metrics by Source/Medium value. Includes: Users, Sessions, Goal Completions, Page Views Per Session, Average Session Duration, Bounce Rate, Goal Conversion Rate.

Methods.Name: List Metrics - v3
Methods.Description: Retrieves the given metric. Go to the following link for a comprehensive list of Dimensions & Metrics; https://ga-dev-tools.web.app/dimensions-metrics-explorer/

Methods.Name: List Metrics - v4
Methods.Description: Retrieves the given metric. Go to the following link for a comprehensive list of Dimensions & Metrics; https://ga-dev-tools.web.app/dimensions-metrics-explorer/
